analysis.description:
BasicToken.totalSupply_ (/unique_chucks/7/0x9e36888dd888b10ff9dc0b35dac17427095de58c.sol#211-212) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- totalSupply (/unique_chucks/7/0x9e36888dd888b10ff9dc0b35dac17427095de58c.sol#213-215)

TokenVault.claim (/unique_chucks/7/0x9e36888dd888b10ff9dc0b35dac17427095de58c.sol#623-653) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- lockedAt == 0

TokenVault.claim (/unique_chucks/7/0x9e36888dd888b10ff9dc0b35dac17427095de58c.sol#623-653) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- lockedAt == 0
TokenVault.getMaxClaimByNow (/unique_chucks/7/0x9e36888dd888b10ff9dc0b35dac17427095de58c.sol#572-586) uses a dangerous strict equality:

TokenVault.getState (/unique_chucks/7/0x9e36888dd888b10ff9dc0b35dac17427095de58c.sol) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- lockedAt == 0

Recoverable.recoverTokens (/unique_chucks/7/0x9e36888dd888b10ff9dc0b35dac17427095de58c.sol#82-86) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(owner,tokensToBeReturned(token)) (/unique_chucks/7/0x9e36888dd888b10ff9dc0b35dac17427095de58c.sol#85-86)

TokenVault.recoverFailedLock (/unique_chucks/7/0x9e36888dd888b10ff9dc0b35dac17427095de58c.sol#551-554) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(owner,token.balanceOf(address(this))) (/unique_chucks/7/0x9e36888dd888b10ff9dc0b35dac17427095de58c.sol#554)

TokenVault.claim (/unique_chucks/7/0x9e36888dd888b10ff9dc0b35dac17427095de58c.sol#623-653) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(investor,amount) (/unique_chucks/7/0x9e36888dd888b10ff9dc0b35dac17427095de58c.sol#649-650)

Reentrancy in TokenVault.TokenVault (/unique_chucks/7/0x9e36888dd888b10ff9dc0b35dac17427095de58c.sol#467-488):
	External calls:
	- ! token.isToken() (/unique_chucks/7/0x9e36888dd888b10ff9dc0b35dac17427095de58c.sol#481)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- freezeEndsAt (/unique_chucks/7/0x9e36888dd888b10ff9dc0b35dac17427095de58c.sol#485)
	- freezeEndsAt (/unique_chucks/7/0x9e36888dd888b10ff9dc0b35dac17427095de58c.sol#485)
	- tokensToBeAllocated (/unique_chucks/7/0x9e36888dd888b10ff9dc0b35dac17427095de58c.sol#485-488)
BasicToken.totalSupply_ should be constant (/unique_chucks/7/0x9e36888dd888b10ff9dc0b35dac17427095de58c.sol#211-212)
